header.supply: Supply of Building Materials and Equipment

about.title: ABOUT US
about.desc: With our knowledge and experience, we guarantee success
about.info: KARDISE implements projects in all regions of Uzbekistan. The company was founded in 1997, and today the number of employees, including engineering and technical staff, exceeds 800 people.

group.clients: We provide the best customer service
group.info: The history of our development is an illustration of the strong and reliable aspirations of our constructive work, the multifaceted work of the company's team, how gradually, moving forward, we were able to foresee and plan future steps for many years ahead.

info.title: The KARDISE company is a diversified structure, the scale of whose business goes beyond exclusively developer activities. The group's activities are focused on several business areas:
info.build: Construction of industrial and civil facilities.
info.work: A full range of design and engineering work.
info.activities: The main directions of KARDISE company's activities are:
info.production: Production of metal and reinforced concrete structures.
info.supply: Supply of building materials and equipment.
